Disclosure Requirement.
Incorporation by reference according to ESRS 1 paragraph 119 requires that all the conditions of
ESRS 1 paragraph 120 be met. One of those conditions is that the disclosure incorporated by
reference ‘constitute a separate element of information and be clearly identified in the document
concerned as addressing the relevant Disclosure Requirement(s), or the relevant specific
